Research and Project Overview

  • AnalyzingWeb Application Vulnerability of Educational Institutions in Bangladesh

    This study aims to detect vulnerabilities of the educational websites in Bangladesh and analyze which scanning tool provides more accurate results. Link

    Krish-e

    An e-platform for farm mechanisation to improve food security and livelihood.User can make purchases an also sell their Agri-related commodities on this app. Github Link

    Puran-o

    PURAN-O is an online second hand book selling and buying app. In this application anyone can open an account where he can upload his copy of book to sell . Similarly, if anyone wants to buy any copy , he can just search it using his account. Github Link

    Contrast Enhancement of Low Light Image

    Here we discussed about enhancement of different low light images using Histogram Equalization (HE) and Illumination Adjustment. Link

    Calculator

    This application runs regression testing and mutation testing on a simple calculator app. Github Link

    Student Database

    This is a complete student database application this application is build with golang using gin framework and i used mongodb as the database and used token bases authentication this application generate a jwt token for token based authentication. Github Link

    File System in Aws

    With this application we can store and retieve file from Amazon AWS system. Github Link

    Blog app

    User can register in this app then they can post blogs and later can comment on them. Github Link

    Maintenance

    Here is some example of software maintenance. Github Link

    UI/UX

    Some UI prototype designed by me.
